Storm_Kick.help: Unleashes a flurry of quick kicks to pummel your foe.
Storm_Kick.targetHelp: Unleashes a flurry of quick kicks to pummel your foe.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Shurikens.help: Three thrown dagger that can hit multiple targets.
Shurikens.targetHelp: Three thrown dagger that can hit multiple targets.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Focused_Fighting.help: You become more evasive to melee and ranged attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.
Focused_Fighting.targetHelp: You become more evasive to melee and ranged attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.

Inner_Focus.help: You become more evasive to melee, ranged attacks, area effect attacks and cone shaped attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.
Inner_Focus.targetHelp: You become more evasive to melee, ranged attacks, area effect attacks and cone shaped attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.

Crane_Kick.help: A slow, high damage kick that can send your target flying!
Crane_Kick.targetHelp: A slow, high damage kick that can send your target flying!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Exploding_Shuriken.help: This small throwing star is rigged to explode on impact. You must have two other Weapon Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Dragons_Tail.help: This low spinning kick deals the same damage as Thunder Kick, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits will trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Dragons_Tail.shortHelp: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockback

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Quickness.help: Your Quick reflexes allow you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow effects. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.
Quickness.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has increased your rate of attack.

Elude.help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Slow
Elude.targetHelp: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Slow
Elude.attackerHit: You are now extremely Elusive, and almost impossible to hit, however, you are too preoccupied to attack foes or assist his allies.

messages.attackerHit: {PowerName} has left you exhausted and unable to Recovery Endurance for a while!
